EmailTemplate.name: Campaign Invite
EmailTemplate.subject: Symposia Invite
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
FAO: {!CampaignMember.FirstName} {!CampaignMember.LastName}
We have please in inviting you to a evening allowing you to talk to other specialists, listen to our guest speaker and enjoy some beautiful food 22nd January 2010 from 6pm Intercontinental HotelLondon W1 This will be a great event and we look forward to seeing you there! Click here to register.
